title: Bloomberg Markets: Chart of the Day, Eco Brief for Sept. 19
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Chart of the Day, Eco Brief for Sept. 19
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Carl Riccadonna Chief US Economist Bloomberg Intelligence Discussing the markets and economy with Bloomberg Stocks Editor Dave Wilson, who also discusses his Chart of the Day "Earnings, inflation signal S&P 500 isn't excessive." Email Dave at DWilson@bloomberg.net to sign up for the Chart.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
